DOC.brief_summary: The study design explore pharmacokinetics Plant-based ingredient two different matrix , different dose level .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male , age start study 20 50 year Body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 20,0 ≤ 25,0 kg/m2 Apparently healthy : medical condition might affect study measurement , absorption , metabolism distribution ( include diabetes type 1 type 2 , gastrointestinal dysfunction , gastrointestinal surgery inflammatory disease ) Fasting blood glucose value subject ≥ 3.4 ≤ 6.1 mmol/litre ( i.e . 62110 mg/dl ) screen Any history diabetes , hyper ( hypo ) glycemia disorder glucose metabolism Any history gastrointestinal disorder ( include frequent diarrhoea example ) Blood donation past 2 month Reported participation another nutritional biomedical trial 3 month prestudy examination study Reported intense sporting activity > 10 h/w Consumption > 21 alcoholic drink typical week Not use eat breakfast Reported use nicotine containing product six month precede study study Use medication interferes study measurement Reported dietary habit : medically prescribe diet , slimming diet Not use eat 3 meal day Vegetarian Reported weight loss/gain ( > 10 % ) last six month study ; Allergy intolerance food product aversion food product ;
